tpunt.project.controllers

Class UserHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tpunt.project.controllers.UserHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="userHandler")
 @SessionScoped
public class UserHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Handles the currently logged in user. This includes performing authentication and authorisation checks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isLoggedInUser

        public boolean isLoggedInUser(User userFromProject)
        Checks to see if the logged in user is the same as the user from the project. This is used to ensure that only users who own a project can modify it.
        Parameters:
        userFromProject -
        Returns:
        whether the two users are the same
